name: LUMEN
goal: To support Health Promotion throught Healthy Life Styles: To enhance and promote European Traditional Medicine; To  spread best practice in environmental sustainability
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Education and training, Environment, Public Health, Sport
euInitiatives: Health in All Policies; European One Health Action Plan against Antimicrobial Resistance; WHO Global Report on Traditional and Complementary Medicine (2019)
